00042 typedef enum
00043 {
00044         JRUrlError = 100,
00045     JRDataParsingError,
00046     JRJsonError,    
00047     JRConfigurationInformationError,
00048     JRSessionDataFinishGetProvidersError    
00049 } JREngageConfigurationError;

00051 typedef enum
00052 {
00053     JRAuthenticationFailedError = 200
00054 } JREngageAuthenticationError;
00055 
00056 typedef enum
00057 {
00058     JRPublishFailedError = 200,
00059     JRPublishErrorMissingApiKey,
00060     JRPublishErrorInvalidOauthToken,
00061     JRPublishErrorDuplicateTwitter,
00062     JRPublishErrorLinkedInCharacterExceded,

00069 #define JRErrorSeverityConfigurationFailed              @"configurationFailed"
00070 #define JRErrorSeverityConfigurationInformationMissing  @"missingInformation"

00100 @interface JRProvider : NSObject
00101 {
00102         NSString *name;
00103     
00104         NSString *friendlyName;
00105         NSString *placeholderText;
00106         NSString *shortText;
00107         BOOL      requiresInput;
00108     
00109     NSString *openIdentifier;
00110         NSString *url;  
00111         
00112     NSString *userInput;
00113         NSString *welcomeString;
00114 }
00115 
00116 @property (readonly) NSString *name;
00117 @property (readonly) NSString *friendlyName;
00118 @property (readonly) NSString *shortText;
00119 @property (readonly) NSString *placeholderText;
00120 @property (readonly) BOOL      requiresInput;
00121 @property (retain)   NSString *userInput;
00122 @property (retain)   NSString *welcomeString;
00123 
00124 - (JRProvider*)initWithName:(NSString*)_name andDictionary:(NSDictionary*)_dictionary;
00125 - (BOOL)isEqualToProvider:(JRProvider*)provider;
00126 @end

00149 @class JRActivityObject;

00151 @interface JRSessionData : NSObject <JRConnectionManagerDelegate>
00152 {
00153         NSMutableArray  *delegates;
00154             
00155         JRProvider *currentProvider;
00156         JRProvider *returningBasicProvider;     
00157     JRProvider *returningSocialProvider;
00158     
00159 /*  allProviders is a dictionary of JRProviders, where each JRProvider contains the information specific
00160     to that provider. basicProviders and socialProviders are arrays of NSStrings, each string being
00161     the primary key in allProviders for that provider.  The arrays are in the order specified by the rp. */
00162         NSMutableDictionary *allProviders;
00163         NSArray             *basicProviders;
00164     NSArray             *socialProviders;
00165     NSMutableDictionary *authenticatedUsersByProvider;
00166         
00167     JRActivityObject *activity;
00168     
00169 //      NSURL *startUrlForCurrentProvider;
00170     
00171     NSString *tokenUrl;
00172         NSString *baseUrl;
00173     NSString *appId;
00174         
00175         // QTS: What is the behavior of this (i.e., how does it affect social publishing?)
00176     //      when selected during a basic authentication call?
00177     BOOL forceReauth;
00178         BOOL hidePoweredBy;
00179     BOOL social;
00180 
00181     BOOL configurationComplete;
00182     NSError  *error;
00183 }
00184 @property (retain)   JRProvider *currentProvider;
00185 @property (readonly) JRProvider *returningBasicProvider;
00186 @property (readonly) JRProvider *returningSocialProvider;
00187 
00188 @property (readonly) NSMutableDictionary *allProviders;
00189 @property (readonly) NSArray             *basicProviders;
00190 @property (readonly) NSArray             *socialProviders;
00191 
00192 @property (retain)   JRActivityObject *activity;
00193 
00194 //@property (readonly) NSURL *startUrlForCurrentProvider;
00195 
00196 @property (retain)   NSString *tokenUrl;
00197 @property (readonly) NSString *baseUrl;
00198 
00199 @property (assign)   BOOL forceReauth;
00200 @property (readonly) BOOL hidePoweredBy;
00201 @property (assign)   BOOL social;
00202 
00203 @property (readonly) BOOL configurationComplete;
00204 @property (readonly) NSError *error;
00205

00207 + (JRSessionData*)jrSessionDataWithAppId:(NSString*)_appId tokenUrl:(NSString*)_tokenUrl andDelegate:(id<JRSessionDelegate>)_delegate;

00216 - (JRProvider*)getSocialProviderAtIndex:(NSUInteger)index;
